post.body: Hey guys! Nice social network. Can we integrate steemit.com upvote button here in order to incentivise bootstrapping this technology?

comment.body: @Talnicrom: I mean special cryptotoken which can be issued when one person likes post of other person. This will bring financial incentive to developing new products for ZeroNet and therefore boosting its growth.
А в чем дело? Что в них плохого?
@Zentralsonne: У меня щас тоже все падает: Steem, ETH, Dash, Decred.
